server.name: io.github.blueskylineassets/agent-observability
server.description: Agent observability: structured logging, cost tracking, and compliance audit trails

environmentVariables.description: API key for the Agent Observability service (get one at POST /v1/register)
environmentVariables.name: AGENT_OBS_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: URL of the Agent Observability API (defaults to http://localhost:8000)
environmentVariables.name: AGENT_OBS_API_URL
